example.name: transitive
example.text: [*-2] Crouched [*-3] at shortstop , Bert Campaneris , once Oakland 's master thief , effortlessly scoops up a groundball and flips it to second .
example.arg: Bert Campaneris , once Oakland 's master thief ,

example.name: arg 0
example.text: The video clip of "Door-Slamming Brother Flipping Out" was broadcast on Jilin TV.

example.name: with arg 1
example.text: John flipped out over Mary's reluctance to dance with him.
